name: Global Makefile
summary: Learn about .GLOBAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GLOBAL files are sometimes referenced by specific program compilers.

description: Configuration file that defines the locations of source files used to compile a program; used by PHP, C/C++, and other languages; automates the compilation process and compiles only new or modified files; commonly named makefile.global.
